amazon_product_details_section.Best Sellers Rank: 14 in Sewing Thread See Top 100 in Home & Kitchen

features: Package Include: 3 rolls hair extension thread with 10 pieces hair weave curved needle.
Hair Weave Curved Needle: These hair weave needles are made of high carbon steel with smooth surface, durable and not easy to get rusty.
Hair Extension Thread: Package include 3 rolls thread, each roll has 76m, totally 228m（Total about 249 yards）. Made of quality nylon, it is breathable, strong and durable for wig sewing.

Features: the hair extension weaving thread thicker than usual thread, durable and strong enough to handle the weight of extensions of any length for months. The needle hole is big, you can easily lead the needle through the hole.
Application: Weaving thread can be used to make wigs, mending leather, wallets, gloves, beading, etc. It can also be used for DIY sewing.
description: Beayuer Weaving Needle Combo Deal Black Thread with 10pcs Needle Package include: * 3pcs Weaving Thread, * 2pcs 57mm Large C Shape Curved Needles * 2pcs 50mm Medium C Type Curved Needles * 2pcs 41mm Small C Type Curved Needle * 2pcs J Shape Needle * 2pcs I Shape Needle Meets all the needs in sewing hair extension Thicker are durable thread which is strong enough to handle the weight of extensions of any length for months Ideal tool set for sewing hair weft, wig hair, hair weave extension, clip hair extension Professional thick weaving thread, wig sewing thread Material: Polyester thread Color: Black, Brown, Beige Quantity: 3 rolls （Total about 228m） Length: Each roll is about 76m Usage: For wig making, craft hand sewing fabric
